ModMetaData.name: LWM's Minor Changes
ModMetaData.author: Little White Mouse
ModMetaData.description:
A set of minor fixes, tweaks, and changes to the game. While many of these ARE "fixes," they oh-so-slightly slow the game and probably don't add a whole lot more than a little realism (e.g., smelters giving off heat). Some of them make the game slightly harder, some make the game much easier to play. I like all of them (otherwise, I wouldn't have made them, right?)
I have added mod settings that allow turning off most of the changes. IMPORTANT NOTE: you will have to restart the game to make these changes take place.
Current changes:
More "realism": * Smelters give off heat * Computers (hi-tech research benches) give off heat ** (maybe later they will fry if the heat gets too much)
UI: * If you have selected a blueprint, and it gets built, you now have selected the finished item. Huzzah!
QoL / Ease of Use: * Penoxycyline now defaults to being taken every 5 days * Weddings now only start with user permission.
Fixes / Improvements: * "Spots" can now be placed pretty much anywhere, including under other things. Want to get married sitting on thrones or standing in a river? Go for it. Want to party around lava? Have fun (lava not included). ** Party Spots may or may not work outside (they certainly don't in terrible weather), but they now work under objects...heck even under some walls. Use discretion. * Multilpe colonists can unload the same animal (sort of)
